title: Mark Pawsey – 2022 Comments on Rishi Sunak Becoming Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Mark Pawsey, the Conservative MP for Rugby, on Twitter on 23 October 2022.
content:
In July I supported Rishi Sunak to be my party’s leader and the country’s Prime Minister due to the seriousness, competence and professionalism he will bring to both roles. I am pleased to continue to offer my support for Rishi to lead us through the challenging times ahead.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
